title: Revise infrastructure loan program and tax credit
Require public hearing before certain tax increment financing bonding
Require voted levies to be in dollars rather than mills
Establish a Montana workforce housing tax credit
Revise law to establish permanent disaster resilience fund
Require appeal process for certain local government health requirements
Generally revise laws relating to selection of public service commissioners
Revising laws related to state land leases for commercial purposes and the sale of state land.
Revise local government public notice and resolution requirements
Revise laws to clarify that local prohibitions on conveying family transfer parcels do not apply to conveyances involving lenders
Establish pole attachment rules and enforcement
Revise laws for divisions of land exempt from subdivision review
Revise coal severance tax coal washing credit
